title: Cryptogreatdane
author: Cryptogreatdane
created_time: September 22, 2023, 08:33:50 PMLast edit: September 24, 2023, 08:07:59 PM by Cryptogreatdane
content: Squirrel Bits 3 coin setThese coins were the turning point for Squirrel bits. This set marks the time that his coins took off in popularity. Prior to these coins mintage was in the single digits. This set was a mintage of 21 and these coins are set #4. This set includes coin 0.001 done in rainbow. only sets 1-7 had the rainbow coin, all the rest were done in black and white. This set also has the old hologram. These were the last coins that used this old style of hologram. All coins from this point on use the squirrel hologram we all know. All coins come loaded from creator.Starting Bid- 0.02Minimum Bid increment- 0.0001SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.END TIME- Sunday September 24th 2023, 1400 PDTPayment- BTC address will be shared with winner via PrivnoteShipping-Based on location and preference. International shipments will be shipped by Miner Jones at winners expense. Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: BONUS ADDEDAs a thank you to you the buyer I am including a bonus with the sale. This is the 2022 Miami conference note. Mintage of these notes was 200. Notes 1-100 were sold exclusively at the Miami conference, and notes 100-200 were sold on the forum. This is note #85 free to you with an auction win. I am also including free shipping to anywhere in the United States. International buyers will get a $20 shipping credit with Miner Jones. 1 hour left in auction. Good luck and I appreciate you all.
